metadata.synopsis: Chatter between Allandra and the Beastmaster while they are exiting the basement.Allandra is leading the beastmaster away and later on we find him drowned in the Waterqueen's house.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Plays if the players choose to hand over the beastmaster to the waveservants.

0.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
0.text: Say your prayers, dwarf. If any god listens to you.

1.speaker: Redhammer the Deviser
1.text: Watch your tongue, salty. You never know who's listening.
